channel.title: I have a few Q's bout editing my server
channel.description:
1-how do i change what npc's sell? im trying to get only a couple people selling things.
2-with action buttons, i made it tele you somewhere but the name of the button wont change. like the laugh button, i got it to tele you to kbd lair but the name wont change. it still says laugh. any help?
3-you know where the quests usually are? well im trying to change whats there to have a list of all the commands that i have on my server. any help here?
